template.name: Template App ISC-DHCPD server
template.description: Для работы LLD нужен userparameter, утилита dhcpd-pools.sourceforge.net, программа jq

master_item.key: system.run["awk -vRS='[\n;]+' '/^lease/ { IP=$2}; /^ binding state/ { state=$3; states[IP]=state}; END { for (ip in states) { ++sum[states[ip]]}; { printf \"%d\", sum[\"active\"]}; }' /var/lib/dhcp/dhcpd.leases"]

item.name: Lease file mtime age
item.description: разница между текущим и временем модификациии lease file

item.name: Active leases
item.key: system.run["awk -vRS='[\n;]+' '/^lease/ { IP=$2}; /^ binding state/ { state=$3; states[IP]=state}; END { for (ip in states) { ++sum[states[ip]]}; { printf \"%d\", sum[\"active\"]}; }' /var/lib/dhcp/dhcpd.leases"]

trigger_prototype.name: DHCP pool "{#DHCPPOOL}" not used for more than a 30 days
DHCP pool "{#DHCPPOOL}" used by more than {$DHCP_PERCENT_USE_WARN:"{#DHCPPOOL}"}%
